OFFICIAL BALLOT
Present Article II or the Constitution now reads?
Dues? The annual dues or registration fees of active members
SHALL BE $10, PAYABLE JANUARY I OF EACH YEAR. OuES OF
ASSOCIATE MEMBERS SHALL BE $5, PAYABLE JANUARY I OF EACH YEAR o
The proposed amendment to the Constiution suggested by the
NAEB Executive Committee and about which you were given
official notice on May I, reads?
Dues: The annual dues of members shall be determined upon
THE BASIS OF TRANSMITTING POWER, NAMELY, FOR AMPLITUDE
MODULATED STATIONS 500 WATTS AND LOWER, $10 PER YEAR? I
KILOWATT AND LOWER TO 500 WATTS, $15 RER YEAR; 5 KILOWATT
AND LOWER TO I KILOWATT, $20 PER YEAR; FOR FREQUENCY
MODULATED STATIONS, UP TO AND INCLUDING 5 KILOV'ATTS,
$10 PER YEAR; UP TO AND INCLUDING tO'KILOWATTS, S * 0 PER YEAR;
AND UP TO 50 KILOWATTS, $20 PER YEAR. OuES FOR INTERNATIONAL
SHORTWAVE STATIONS SHALL BE COMPUTED ON THE SAME BASIS AS
FREQUENCY MODULATED STATIONS. MEMBER INSTITUTIONS OWNING OR
OPERATING MORE THAN ONE STATION OR HOLDING A CONSTRUCTION
PERMIT FOR MORE THAN ONE, MUST PAY THE COMBINED RATE FOR
THE TWO STATIONS, BUT IN NO EVENT IN EXCESS OF $20 PER YEAR.
I VOTE IN FAVOR OF THE PROPOSED CONSTITUTIONAL CHANGE.
I VOTE AGAINST THE PROPOSED CONSTITUTIONAL CHANGE_
For:
(Signature)
